prefsnologintext2: Biko banye ka ịgbanwee mmasị gị.
prefsnologintext2-for-temp-user: Biko kepụta ndebanye gị ka i nwee ike ịgbanwe nhọrọ gị.
prefs-tabs-navigation-hint: Ndụmọdụ: I nwere ike iji igodo ntụaka aka ekpe na aka nri gawa n’etiti taabụ dị na ndepụta taabụ.
prefs-sections-navigation-hint: Ndụmọdụ: I nwere ike iji igodo Tab na Shift + Tab i ji gawa n’etiti ngalaba nhọrọ.
prefs-description-personal: Jikwaa otú i si egosipụta, jikọọ, na zikọọ ozi.
prefs-help-realname:
Ezigbo aha abụghị mmanye.
Ọ bụrụ na e nyere ya, e nwere ike iji ya nye gị nkwanye maka ọrụ gị.
passwordtooshort: Okwungafe gị ga abụrịrị opekampe {{PLURAL:$1|1 character|$1 mkpụrụedemede}}.
password-substring-username-match: Okwungafe gị ekwesịghị igosipụta n'ime aha njiarụ gị.
password-name-match: Okwungafe gị ga-adị iche na aha njiarụ gị.
password-login-forbidden: Egbochiwo iji aha njiarụ a na okwungafe a.
passwordincommonlist: Okwungafe a etinyere dị n'ime ndepụta okwungafe a na-ejikarị eme ihe. Biko họrọ okwungafe pụrụ iche.
prefs-help-yourpassword: Etinyelarị ọrụ nweghachị akaụntụ a. Lee $1 maka ntọala ndị ọzọ.
tog-prefershttps: Gbaa mbọ oge niile hụ na i ji njikọta doro anya mgbe ọbụla ị chọrọ ibanye n'ịntanetị
prefs-help-prefershttps: Nhọrọ a ga-amalite ịrụ ọrụ na mbanye ọzọ gị.
prefs-user-downloaddata-info: Ozi akaụntụ m si n'oru a
prefs-user-restoreprefs-info: Weghachite nhọrọ ndabere niile (na ngalaba niile).
yourgender: Kedu otu ị chọrọ ka akọwa gị?
gender-unknown: MMgbe ha na-akpọtụ gị, akụrụngwa a ga-eji  ụdị okike nke na anaghị arụtụ ụdịdị mgbe o nwere ike
prefs-help-gender:
Idezi mmasị a dị nhọrọ.
Akụrụngwa a na-eji uru ya na-agwa gị okwu na iji kọwaara gị ma gwa ndị ọzọ maka gị site na iji ụtọ asụsụ okike kwesịrị ekwesị.
Ozi a ga-abụ ihe ọha.
prefs-help-variant: Nhọrọ kacha masị gị ma ọ bụ ederede iji gosipụta ọdịnaya ibe nke wiki n'ime.
tog-fancysig: Were mbinyeaka dịka Wikitest (na-etinyeghị nkokọ n'ihu akwụkwọ eji mara gị)
prefs-help-signature: Ekwesịrị iji ya bịanye aka na nkwupụta na ibe okwu<nowiki> ~~~~</nowiki> ", nke a ga-agbanwe ka ọ bụrụ mbinyeaka gị na akara oge.
prefs-signature-invalid-warning: Mbinyeaka gị nwere ike ịkpata nsogbu na ngwaọrụ ụfọdụ.
prefs-signature-invalid-new: Mbinyeaka gị ugbu a adịghị irè. Ọ bụ ezie na ị ka nwere ike iji ya, ị gaghị enwe ike ịgbanwe ya ruo mgbe ị ga-edozi ya.
prefs-signature-invalid-disallow: Mbinyeaka gị ugbu a adịghị irè. Ruo mgbe ị doziri ya, a ga-eji mbinye aka ndabara mee ihe mgbe ị na-etinye aka na nkwupụta gị.
badsig:
Akara mbinyeaka na-adịghị irè.
Lelee mkpado HTML.
badsiglength:
Mbinyeaka gị toro oke ogologo.
O kwesịghị ịbụ karịa $1 {{PLURAL:$1| mkpụrụedemede|mkpụrụedemede}} n'ogologo.
badsigsubst: Mbinyeaka gị nwere akwụ ngbanwe (dịka subst: ma ọ bụ ~~~~ ).
badsightml: Mbinyeaka gị nwere usoro HTML na-abaghị uru ma ọ bụ nke a na-ejighịzi eme ihe:
badsiglinks: Mbinyeaka gị ga-agụnye njikọ na ibe onye ọrụ gị, ibe okwu ma ọ bụ arụmọrụ na wiki a. Biko tinye ya, dịka ọmụmaatụ: $1.
badsiglinebreak: Mbinyeaka gị ga-abụrịrị otu ahịrị wikitext.
prefs-changeemail: Gbanwee ma ọ bụ wepu aha nji ọwaozi ịntanetị
prefs-help-email: Aha nji ọwaozi ịntanetị dị nhọrọ, mana achọrọ ya maka nrụpụta okwungafe, ọ bụrụ na ichefuo okwungafe gị.
prefs-help-email-required: Á chọrọ aha nji ọwaozi ịntanetị.
prefs-help-email-others:
I nwekwara ike ịhọrọ ikwe ka ndị ọzọ kpọtụrụ gị site na ọwaozi ịntanetị, site na njikọ dị na ibe ngosi ọrụ gị ma ọ bụ ibe mkparịta ụka gị.
Anaghị egosi aha nji ọwaozi ịntanetị gị mgbe ndị ọzọ na-akpọtụrụ gị.
tog-requireemail: Zite akara imelu njiri ngafe naani mgbe igosiri  imelu na aha njiri abanye gi
prefs-help-requireemail: Nke a na-eme ka nzuzo dịkwuo mma ma na-enyekwa aka igbochi ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị ndị a na-arịọghị.
noemailprefs: Kọwaa aha nji ọwaozi ịntanetị n’ime ntọala gị ka atụmatụ ndị a rụọ ọrụ.
emailnotauthenticated:
Ekwetabeghị Aha nji ọwaozi ịntanetị gị.
A gaghị ezipu ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị ọ bụla maka njirimara ndị a.
emailconfirmlink: Nabata aha nji ọwaozi ịntanetị gị
emailauthenticated: A nabatara aha nji ọwaozi ịntanetị gị na $2 n’oge $3.
allowemail: Kwe ka ndị ọzọ nwee ike iziga m ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị
email-allow-new-users-label: Kwe ka ndị ọrụ ọhụrụ kpamkpam zitere m ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị
prefs-help-email-allow-new-users: Ịgbanye nhọrọ a ga-ekwe ka ndị ọrụ na-abụghị ndị [[{{MediaWiki:grouppage-autoconfirmed}}|ekwenyere akpaghị aka]] zitere gị ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị.
tog-ccmeonemails: Zitere m akwụkwọ ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị m zigara ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ
email-mutelist-label: Gbochie ndị ọrụ a iziga m ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị:
tog-enotifwatchlistpages: Ziterem ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị mgbe otu ihu akwụkwọ maọbụ otu failụ nọ n'ihe ndị na-elebara anya gbanwere
tog-enotifusertalkpages: Zigara m ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị mgbe agbanwere ibe okwu onye ọrụ m
tog-enotifminoredits: Zitekwara m ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị maka obere mgbanwo dị na ibe akwụkwọ na failụ nhaziri
tog-enotifrevealaddr: Gosipụta aha nji ọwaozi ịntanetị m na nkwupụta ozi ọwaozi ịntanetị
prefs-description-rendering: Hazie akpụkpọ, nha na nhọrọ ọgụgụ.
prefs-common-config: CSS/JavaScript a na-ekerịta maka akpụkpọ niile:
prefs-custom-cssjs-safemode: CSS/JavaScript emebere nkeonwe adịghị ugbu a ka agbanyere ọnọdụ nchekwa. Biko [[#mw-input-wpforcesafemode| gbanyụọ ọnọdụ nchekwa]] iji jiri CSS/JavaScript emebere nkeonwe.
prefs-help-skin-responsive: Nabata okirikiri nhọrọ ukwuu na nha ihuenyo na mkpanaka.
timezoneuseoffset: Ndị ọzọ (mgbanwe oge site na UTC)
timezone-invalid: Mpaghara oge ma ọ bụ mmegharị oge ezighi ezi.
imagemaxsize: Ónụ oke nha onyonyo na ibe nkọwa faịlụ:
tog-diffonly: É zìkwàlà ihe nọr na ihü di okpúrù íchiè
tog-norollbackdiff: egosila ndíiche ma í gosipútacha otu ebe a di na mbú
tog-showrollbackconfirmation: zipụta lịnkị na-egosi mgbe a na-eme ndezighari
tog-forcesafemode: Na-eme ka [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Manual:Safemode|ọnọdụ nchekwa]] dịrị mgbe niile
prefs-help-forcesafemode: Gbanyụọ skrip na akwụkwọ ejiji dị n'ime wiki.
prefs-description-editing: Hazie otu ị si edezi, soro, ma nyochaa ndezi.
tog-editsectiononrightclick: kpaa aka n'aka nri iji nyere aka na nkeji nke na-ahazi  isiokwu nkeji dị iche iche
tog-editondblclick: Hazie ihu akwụkwọ ndi a site na kliki ugboro abụọ
editfont-monospace: Otụ ihe ná kechí mkpúrù èdè
tog-minordefault: Me ka nhoro da na orü ntakịrị níle
tog-forceeditsummary: Zitere m ozi mgbe ị na-aba na ndezi oghere dị na ya
tog-editrecovery-help: Ị nwere ike ikwu echiche gị na [$1 ibe mkparịta ụka oru ngo].
tog-useeditwarning: gwam mgbe m hapụrụ ihu akwụkwọ nhaziri na echekwaghị ihe ndị m gbamworo
tog-previewonfirst: Zi nkirimaatụ mgbe ị na-ebido ndezi
tog-previewontop: Zitú ntàkịrị mgbe opuzọr zi igbe orü
tog-uselivepreview: Gosi nkirimaatụ na-ebipụtagharị ihe niile dị n'ihu akwụkwọ
recentchangesdays: Ụbọchị ị ga-egosi na mgbanwe ọhụrụ:
recentchangescount: Ọnụọgụ mgbanwe a ga-egosi na mgbanwe ọhụrụ, akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ibe, na ndekọ, site na ndabara:
tog-usenewrc: ngbanwe otu na-esite n'ihu akwụkwọ nwere mgbanwe ọhụụ nakwa ihe nrụba ama.
rcfilters-preference-help: Na-ebufe [[{{#special:RecentChanges}}|mgbanwe ọhụrụ]] na [[{{#special:RecentChangesLinked}}|mgbanwe metụtara ya]] n’enweghị nchọgharị ahọpụtara ma ọ bụ ọrụ egosipụta ihe dị iche.
tog-hideminor: Zonari orü ntàkírí na nwerue mẹrẹ ogẹ nsó
tog-hidecategorization: Zoo nkewasị e nwere n' ihu akwụkwọ nke ọbụla
tog-hidepatrolled: Zonari orü ha hụrụ na nwerue mẹrẹ ogẹ nsó
tog-newpageshidepatrolled: Zonari orü ha hụrụ shí ndetu ihü ohúrù
tog-shownumberswatching: Zi onuogụgụ ndi na banife nke ne lé
prefs-description-watchlist: Jikwaa ma hazie n’ụzọ masị gị ndepụta nke ibe ị na-eso.
prefs-editwatchlist: Rüó na ndétu ihe Í nè lé
prefs-editwatchlist-label: Dezie ihe edere na ndepụta nche gị:
prefs-editwatchlist-edit: Lee ma wepu aha ndị dị na ndepụta nche gị
prefs-editwatchlist-raw: Dezie ndepụta nche dị n’usoro mbu
prefs-watchlist-days: Ụbọchị e kwesiri igosi na ndepụta nche:
prefs-watchlist-edits: Ọnụọgụ mgbanwe kacha elu e kwesiri igosi na ndepụta nche:
tog-extendwatchlist: Gbasa ndetu ihe ánà elé ka ó zi gbanwere nke níle, o bughi nani nke isi nso
tog-watchlistunwatchlinks: Tinye ihe nriba ama ozigbo ozigbo({{int:Watchlist-unwatch}}/{{int:Watchlist-unwatch-undo}}) iji leba anya n'ihe mgbanwo dị n'ihu akwukwọ.(JavaScript required for toggle functionality)
rcfilters-watchlist-preference-help: Na-ebunye [[{{#special:Watchlist}}|ndepụta nche]] na-enweghị ọrụ nchịkọta, ọchụchọ, ma ọ bụ ngosipụta ngosi.
tog-watchlisthideminor: Zonari orü ntakịrị fwuör ndetu ihem ne lé
tog-watchlisthidebots: Zonari orü bot fwuör ndetu ihem ne lé
tog-watchlisthideown: Zonari orüm fwuör ndetu ihem ne lé
tog-watchlisthideanons: Zonari orü ndi na banife nke ndi ámághị, fwuör ndetu ihem ne lé
tog-watchlisthideliu: Zonari orü ndi na banife nke ndi banyèrè a banyé, fwuör ndetu ihem ne lé
tog-watchlistreloadautomatically: Gosigharia ihe nlebara anya ozigbo e nwere ihe mgbanwe (java script required)
tog-watchlisthidepatrolled: Zonari orü ha nè léfù ányá fwuör ndetu ihem ne lé
tog-watchdefault: Gbakwụnye ihu akwụkwọ na failụ ndi a nhaziri n'ihe m ga na-elebara anya
tog-watchmoves: Tinye ihu akwụkwọ na failụ niile mụ bugara n'ihe m ga na-elebara anya
tog-watchdeletion: Tinye ihu akwụkwọ na failụ niile m hichara n'ebe m ga na-elebara anya
tog-watchcreations: Mgbakwụnye ihu akwụkwọ na failụ ndi a m mepụtara na ihe m ga na-elebara anya
tog-watchuploads: Tinye failụ ohụụ m mere ọpụload n'ihe mụ ga na -elebara anya
tog-watchrollback: Gbakwụnye ihu akwụkwọgasị ebe m mere ndezigharị n'ịhe m ga na-elebara anya
prefs-help-tokenmanagement: Ị nwere ike ịhụ ma tọgharịa igodo nzuzo maka akaụntụ gị nke nwere ike ịnweta Web feed nke ndepụta nche gị. Onye ọbụla maara igodo a nwere ike ịgụ ndepụta nche gị, ya mere ejila ya kesa
prefs-description-searchoptions: Họrọ otu autocomplete na nsonaazụ si arụ ọrụ.
searchlimit-label: Ọnụọgụ nsonaazụ ọchụchọ e kwesịrị igosi na ibe ọ bụla:
search-thumbnail-extra-namespaces-label: Gosi obere onyonyo na Special:Search na desktọọpụ
search-thumbnail-extra-namespaces-messag: Na-egosi onyonyo nta maka nsonaazụ $1 {{PLURAL:$2|ọrụ-ogugu|ọrụ-ogugu}} n’ime peeji ọchụchọ ({#spụrụ iche: chọọ}}.
prefs-reset-intro:
Ị nwere ike iji ibe a tọgharịa ntọala gị gaa na ndabere saịtị.
A pụghị ihichapụ nke a ma ọ bụ gbanwee ya azụ.
prefs-reset-confirm: Ee, achọrọ m ịtọgharịa ntọala m.
